channel.title: CVE Feed for PerkinElmer -- ProcessPlus
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PerkinElmer -- ProcessPlus

item.title: CVE-2024-6912|2024-08-01T21:45:38.344Z -- perkinelmer -- processplus
item.description: Use of hard-coded MSSQL credentials in PerkinElmer ProcessPlus on Windows allows an attacker to login remove on all prone installations.This issue affects ProcessPlus: through 1.11.6507.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-6911|2024-08-01T21:45:38.235Z -- perkinelmer -- processplus
item.description: Files on the Windows system are accessible without authentication to external parties due to a local file inclusion in PerkinElmer ProcessPlus.This issue affects ProcessPlus: through 1.11.6507.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-6913|2024-08-01T21:45:38.350Z -- perkinelmer -- processplus
item.description: Execution with unnecessary privileges in PerkinElmer ProcessPlus allows an attacker to spawn a remote shell on the windows system.This issue affects ProcessPlus: through 1.11.6507.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-6913|2024-07-22T21:00:08.315Z -- perkinelmer -- processplus
item.description: Execution with unnecessary privileges in PerkinElmer ProcessPlus allows an attacker to spawn a remote shell on the windows system.This issue affects ProcessPlus: through 1.11.6507.0.
